title: baNDaasura
sahitya:
bhaNDAsura vimardhini bhaktajana paripAlini

anupallavi

 paNDita jana bhUSaNi padmarAga mAlini

caraNam 1

 dEvarAjanutE girisutE dEvi divya suSumAnvitE bhAva rAga tALayuta bhavya sangItanutE
shrI vadhUpa sOdari shrI rAjarAjEshvari dEva dEva harikEsha dEvi paripAlisau

caraNam 2

dEvarAjanibha vibhavana dEvi ninna nija bhaktana bhAva rAga tALayuta bhavya sangIta
 lOlana bhUva dhUpa nALvaTi shrI puNya krSNarAjEndrana dEva dEva harikEsha dEvi paripAlisau
